mapper.select: SELECT social_id, user_id, social_provider, social_provider_user_id, social_email, social_access_token, social_refresh_token, social_linked_at FROM social_account WHERE social_provider = #{provider} AND social_provider_user_id = #{providerUserId}

SELECT social_id, user_id, social_provider, social_provider_user_id, social_email, social_access_token, social_refresh_token, social_linked_at FROM social_account WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND social_provider = #{provider}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO social_account ( user_id, social_provider, social_provider_user_id, social_email, social_access_token, social_refresh_token, social_linked_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{socialProvider}, #{socialProviderUserId}, #{socialEmail}, #{socialAccessToken}, #{socialRefreshToken}, #{socialLinkedAt} )
